CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The weak electron - donating characteristic of TA , which has 2-D extended conjugation by thiophene side groups , makes the copolymer exhibit a low - lying HOMO level of -5.5 eV with a low band - gap of 1.65 eV , which affords both high photo - voltage and photocurrent of the polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| TA |
| thiophene |

The entities in the paragraph are:

* TA: A polymer with 2-D extended conjugation by thiophene side groups.
* thiophene: A molecule with a low - lying HOMO level of -5.5 eV and a low band - gap of 1.65 eV.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Material Name" in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| TA |
| thiophene |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The weak electron - donating characteristic of TA , which has 2-D extended conjugation by thiophene side groups , makes the copolymer exhibit a low - lying HOMO level of -5.5 eV with a low band - gap of 1.65 eV , which affords both high photo - voltage and photocurrent of the polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| TA (thiophene) |
| HOMO (highest occupied molecular orbital) level |
| band gap |
| photo-voltage (photovoltage) |
| photocurrent (photocurrent) |

Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, using the same words and capitalization.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material property" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO level |
| band gap |
| photo-voltage |
| photocurrent |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to material properties:

* TA (thiophene) - This is a type of organic molecule that is used to synthesize the copolymer.
* photo-voltage (photovoltage) - This is a measure of the voltage generated in a solar cell due to the absorption of light.
* photocurrent (photocurrent) - This is the flow of charge generated in a solar cell due to the absorption of light.
